content: {"name": "South Philadelphia Community Fridge @ Growing Together Garden", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Resource has no phone number however, email and FB is available (https://www.facebook.com/southphlcommunityfridge) and please check their website as well.\nFridge location: 26th and reed st out side of Growing Together Garden \nFridge image : https://www.instagram.com/p/C4YGVhDP9mZ/?hl=en&img_index=1", "email": "", "url": "https://southphillyfridge.com/locations", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2537 Reed Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Grays Ferry", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19146", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9353801, "longitude": -75.18685099999999}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "11:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open 24/7! Free, outdoor community fridge/pantry operated by local volunteers."}]}
